items.text_for_match: 'Too much for Fulham' - Silva criticises 'impossible' VAR calls Fulham boss Marco Silva said it is "impossible" to understand the video assistant referee decisions that went against his side during Sunday's 3-1 loss at Aston Villa. Fulham boss Marco Silva said it is "impossible" to understand the video assistant referee decisions that went against his side during Sunday's 3-1 loss at Aston Villa.

items.ja: Palhinha rescues late point for Spurs against Wolves
items.en: Palhinha rescues late point for Spurs against Wolves
items.text_for_match: Palhinha rescues late point for Spurs against Wolves Joao Palhinha rescues a point for Tottenham Hotspur with an injury-time equaliser against Wolves. Joao Palhinha rescues a point for Tottenham Hotspur with an injury-time equaliser against Wolves.

items.ja: Haaland double helps Man City hit five past Burnley
items.en: Haaland double helps Man City hit five past Burnley
items.text_for_match: Haaland double helps Man City hit five past Burnley Erling Haaland scores twice late on and Maxime Esteve inadvertently scores two own goals to help Manchester City to a thumping Premier League victory over Burnley. items.ja: Brighton come from behind to beat 10-man Chelsea
items.en: Brighton come from behind to beat 10-man Chelsea
items.text_for_match: Brighton come from behind to beat 10-man Chelsea Danny Welbeck scores twice as Brighton come from behind to beat an ill-disciplined Chelsea side who have a player sent off for the second Saturday running. items.ja: Brentford beat Man Utd after Fernandes misses penalty
items.en: Brentford beat Man Utd after Fernandes misses penalty
items.text_for_match: Brentford beat Man Utd after Fernandes misses penalty  Manchester United skipper Bruno Fernandes has a second-half penalty saved as Ruben Amorim's side slip to a Premier League defeat at Brentford. items.ja: Nketiah stoppage-time Palace winner subjects Liverpool to first league defeat
items.en: Nketiah stoppage-time Palace winner subjects Liverpool to first league defeat
items.text_for_match: Nketiah stoppage-time Palace winner subjects Liverpool to first league defeat Eddie Nketiah strikes with virtually the last kick of an enthralling encounter at Selhurst Park to give Crystal Palace a deserved victory and end Premier League leaders Liverpool's five-match winning start to the season. items.ja: 'A culture to win' - how have Man City turned form around?
items.en: 'A culture to win' - how have Man City turned form around?
items.text_for_match: 'A culture to win' - how have Man City turned form around? After the disappointing end to August, September had the potential to turn into a crisis for Manchester City and manager Pep Guardiola, but they have turned their form around. After the disappointing end to August, September had the potential to turn into a crisis for Manchester City and manager Pep Guardiola, but they have turned their form around.

items.ja: On the beach with Arteta and love of reading - Iraola in his own words

items.ja: Where will Barcelona host Champions League football?
items.en: Where will Barcelona host Champions League football?
items.text_for_match: Where will Barcelona host Champions League football? Barcelona are set to play their Champions League home games away from their iconic Nou Camp home. Barcelona are set to play their Champions League home games away from their iconic Nou Camp home.
